DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Endologix fenestrated stent graft system safe feasible endovascular repair juxtarenal pararenal aortic aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Endologix Fenestrated Stent Graft System
DOC.criteria: Informed consent understood sign pt agrees followup visit ; Abdominal aortic aneurysm diameter ≥5cm ≥4cm increase 0.5cm past six month Adequate iliac/femoral access compatible require delivery system Nonaneurysmal infrarenal aortic neck < 15mm length Most caudal renal artery aortoiliac bifurcation length least 70mm Proximal nonaneurysmal aortic neck SMA : diameter 18 34 mm ; length least 15 mm ; angle ( clock face ) < 60° aneurysm sac ; Angle < 60° ( clock face ) SMA celiac artery Renal artery distal SMA 035mm , within 30mm axially , 4 8mm lumen diameter , clockface angle 90° 210° Iliac anatomy suitable commercial bifurcate stent graft ; Minimum 3cm overlap achievable fenestrated bifurcated stent graft Life expectancy < 1 year judge investigator ; Psychiatric condition may interfere study ; Participating enrollment 30day followup phase another clinical study ; Known allergy device component ; Coagulopathy uncontrolled bleed disorder ; Contraindication contrast medium anticoagulant ; Ruptured , leaking , dissect , mycotic aneurysm ; Serum creatinine ( SCr ) level > 2.0 mg/dL ; Traumatic vascular injury ; Active systemic localize groin infection ; Connective tissue disease ( e.g. , Marfan 's Syndrome ) ; Recent ( within prior three month ) cerebrovascular accident myocardial infarction ; Prior renal transplant ; Length either renal artery stented < 13mm ; Significant occlusive disease calcification either renal artery ; An essential accessory renal artery ; Indispensable inferior mesenteric artery ; Untreated aneurysmal disease descend thoracic aorta ; Clinically significant mural thrombus circumferentially suprarenal segment ; Prior iliac artery stent implant may interfere delivery system introduction ; Unsuitable vascular anatomy Pregnancy ( female patient childbearing potential )
